title: Healthier houmous
description: A healthier houmous recipe with 2.6g less fat than the traditional version and only 32kcals per serving.
ingredients: dried spice, such as paprika, for sprinkling

method.Step 1: Drain and rinse the chickpeas, put in a food processor and whizz with the water, garlic, tahini paste, lemon juice and salt.

method.Step 2: Once almost smooth, check the seasoning and adjust if necessary, then transfer to a serving dish.

method.Step 3: Serve drizzled with extra-virgin olive oil if you like and scattered with a dry spice of your choice.
